headerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Photovoltaic system. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set the accessory name to be displayed in HomeKit.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the envoy ip address/hostname or leave empty (will be used default path envoy.local).

envoyFirmware7xx.title: Firmware 7.x.x
envoyFirmware7xx.description: This enable support for Envoy with firmware 7.x.x and newer.

envoyPasswd.title: Envoy Password
envoyPasswd.description: Here set the envoy password (only if You already changed default password).

envoySerialNumber.title: Envoy Serial Number
envoySerialNumber.description: Here set the envoy serial number.

enlightenUser.title: Enlighten User
enlightenUser.description: Here set the enlighten user name.

powerProductionSummary.title: Power Summary
powerProductionSummary.description: Here set the power summary in (W) of all microinverters, based on this value the power production level will be calculated and displayed as (%) in HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: Here set power level in (W) at which the sensor fired.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

energyLevel.title: Enargy Level
energyLevel.description: Here set enargy level in (Wh) at which the sensor fired.

energyProductionLifetimeOffset.title: Energy Lifetime Offset
energyProductionLifetimeOffset.description: Here set offset in (Wh) for energy production, if nedded.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: Here set power level in (W) at which the sensor fired.

energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.title: Energy Lifetime Offset
energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.description: Here set offset in (Wh) for energy consumption total, if nedded.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

energyLevel.title: Enargy Level
energyLevel.description: Here set enargy level in (Wh) at which the sensor fired.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: Here set power level in (W) at which the sensor fired, (-) negative value mean exporting energy to the grid.

energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.title: Energy Lifetime Offset
energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.description: Here set offset in (Wh) for energy consumption net, if nedded.

energyConsumptionNetStateSensor.title: Energy State Sensor

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

energyConsumptionNetStateSensor.description: This enable consumptiom net energy state monitoring and expose contact sensor in HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

energyLevel.title: Energy Level
energyLevel.description: Here set energy level in (Wh) at which the sensor fired.

supportProductionPowerMode.title: Power Production
supportProductionPowerMode.description: This enable support to check/control power production, firmware 7.x.x and newer required installer credentials data.

supportPlcLevel.title: PLC Level
supportPlcLevel.description: This enable support to check plc level, firmware 7.x.x and newer required installer credentials data.

supportEnsembleStatus.title: Ensemble Status
supportEnsembleStatus.description: This enable support to check ensemble status, may not working with all envoy firmwares, if error occur please disable it.

supportEnchargeProfile.title: Profile
supportEnchargeProfile.description: This enable support to check/control encharge profile.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

backupLevel.title: Level
backupLevel.description: Here set backup level in (%) at which the sensor fired.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

supportLiveData.title: Live Data
supportLiveData.description: This enable support to check live data.

liveDataRefreshTime.title: Live Data Sampling
liveDataRefreshTime.description: Here set live data refresh time in (sec).

metersDataRefreshTime.title: Meters Sampling
metersDataRefreshTime.description: Here set meters data refresh time in (sec).

ensembleDataRefreshTime.title: Ensemble Sampling
ensembleDataRefreshTime.description: Here set ensemble data refresh time in (sec).

productionDataRefreshTime.title: Production Sampling
productionDataRefreshTime.description: Here set production data rfresh time in (sec).

disableLogInfo.title: Disable Log Info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable log info, all values and state will not be displayed in Homebridge log console.

disableLogDeviceInfo.title: Disable Log Device Info
disableLogDeviceInfo.description: This disable log device info by every connections device to the network.

restFulDebug.title: Debug
restFulDebug.description: This enable debug mode for RESTFul.

restFulPort.title: Port
restFulPort.description: Here set the listening Port for RESTful server.

mqttDebug.title: Debug
mqttDebug.description: This enable debug mode for MQTT.

mqttHost.title: IP/Hostname
mqttHost.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

mqttPort.title: Port
mqttPort.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

mqttClientId.title: Client ID
mqttClientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

mqttAuth.title: Authorization
mqttAuth.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

mqttUser.title: User
mqttUser.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

mqttPasswd.title: Password
mqttPasswd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.

items.title: Envoy
items.description: Here You can configure envoy gateway.

items.title: Power State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for power state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Power Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for power level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for energy state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for energy level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Power State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for power state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Power Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for power level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for energy state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for energy level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Power State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for power state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Power Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for power level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy State Sensor
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for energy state monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Energy Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create multiple sensors for energy level monitoring and expose it in HomeKit.

items.title: Grid Mode Sensors
items.description: In this section You can create sensors for enpower grid mode monitoring and expose it in HomeKit. If grid mode matches, the contact fired.

items.title: Grid Mode Sensors
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for encharge grid mode monitoring and expose it in HomeKit. If grid mode matches, the contact fired.

items.title: Backup Level Sensors
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for encharge backup level and expose it in HomeKit. If backup level matches, the contact fired.

items.title: Grid Mode Sensors
items.description: In this section You can enable sensor for solar grid mode monitoring and expose it in HomeKit. If grid mode matches, the contact fired.

items.title: System
items.description: Here You can configure system settings.
